TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent extends System.Web.Management.WebSuccessAuditEvent

summary.span: 提供成功驗證事件的相關資訊

span.span: Provides information about successful authentication events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 健康監視，可讓生產環境和作業人員管理已部署的 Web 應用程式。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空間包含負責封裝應用程式健全狀況狀態資料和負責處理此資料提供者類型的健康情況事件型別。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它也會包含有助於管理健全狀況事件的支援型別。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 下列清單說明 ASP.NET 會引發事件的型別功能。The following list describes the features for which ASP.NET raises events of type . > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET 設定的預設記錄稽核失敗的狀況，因為記錄成功情況可以嚴重耗用系統資源。By default ASP.NET is configured to log audit failure conditions only, as logging success conditions can severely strain system resources. 您永遠可以設定系統以記錄成功的情況。You can always configure the system to log the success conditions. - 表單驗證。Forms Authentication. 稽核成功的條件。Successful conditions are audited. 成功稽核會包含已驗證的使用者名稱。Success audits include the user name that was authenticated. 相反地，稽核失敗不會包含使用者名稱，，因為它們通常會產生從無法解密或驗證票證。Instead, failure audits do not include the user name, since they typically result from a ticket that failed decryption or validation. 同時包含用戶端 IP 位址。Both contain the client IP address. 相關的事件的稽核程式碼是。The related event audit code is . - 成員資格。Membership. 稽核成功的條件。Successful conditions are audited. 成功及失敗稽核會包含所嘗試的使用者名稱。Both success and failure audits contain the username that was attempted. 兩種稽核會包含已嘗試的密碼，因為，會有風險保存記錄檔中有效的密碼。Neither form of audit will contain the password that was attempted, because that would risk persisting a valid password in the log. 相關的事件的稽核程式碼是。The related event audit code is . 當引發時，依預設它會更新 驗證成功引發事件的效能計數器。When a is raised, by default it updates the Authentication Success Events Raised performance counter. 若要檢視中的 [系統監視器 (PerfMon)，此效能計數器**新增計數器**視窗中選取**ASP.NET**中**效能物件**下拉式清單中，選取驗證成功引發的事件] 效能計數器，然後按一下 [**新增**] 按鈕。To view this performance counter in System Monitor (PerfMon), in the **Add Counters** window select **ASP.NET** in the **Performance object** drop-down list, select the Authentication Success Events Raised performance counter, and click the **Add** button. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 應用程式中使用 「 系統監視器 (PerfMon)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=36882&clcid=0x409) MSDN 上。For more information, see [Using the System Monitor (PerfMon) with ASP.NET Applications](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=36882&clcid=0x409) on MSDN. > [!NOTE] > 在大部分情況下您將實作時，使用 ASP.NET 健康監視類型，您會指定中的值，以便控制健全狀況監視系統`healthMonitoring`組態區段。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 您也可以衍生自健全狀況監視的型別，來建立您自己的自訂事件和提供者。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 如需範例的衍生自類別，請參閱本主題中提供的範例。For an example of deriving from the class, see the example provided in this topic. ## Examples 此程式碼範例有兩個部分： 組態檔摘錄，後面接著程式碼會示範如何自訂事件。This code example has two parts: a configuration-file excerpt, followed by code that shows how to customize the event. 以下是組態檔案的摘錄`provider`和`eventMappings`區段。This following is an excerpt of the configuration file's `provider` and `eventMappings` sections. 它們已經是預設設定。They are already set by default. 唯一要做為提供的安裝程式`rules`中的項目`healthMonitoring`一節。The only thing you need to do is to provide the setup for the `rules` element in the `healthMonitoring` section. ``` // Configure the provider to process // the health events. // Configure the custom event // to handle the audit events. // Establish the connection between custom event // and the provider that must process it. \ ``` 下列程式碼示範如何自訂事件。The following code shows how to customize the event. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent/CS/WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent/VB/WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 狀況監控系統是在內部使用這個建構函式。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 您永遠不會使用它來具現化物件，但是您可以呼叫這個建構函式實作您自己的事件類型繼承自這個類別時。You will never use it to instantiate a object, but you can call this constructor when implementing your own event type that inherits from this class. > [!NOTE] > 建構函式不是直接從您的程式碼使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它是由 ASP.NET 呼叫。It is called by ASP.NET. 您可以呼叫建構函式，若是衍生自類別。You can call the constructor when deriving from the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何自訂此建構函式。The following code example shows how to customize this constructor. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent/CS/WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent/VB/WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent.vb#2)]

summary.span: 取得已驗證使用者的名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the authenticated user.
The name of the authenticated user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有成功稽核會包含已驗證的使用者名稱。Only the success audits include the name of the authenticated user. 失敗的稽核不包含使用者名稱，因為它們通常是由解密或驗證失敗所造成。The failure audits do not include the user name, since they typically result from failed decryption or validation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent/CS/WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent/VB/WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent.vb#3)]
